name: LISA The Joyful: Growing Pains
summary: LISA the Joyful: Growing Pains is a Lisa the Joyful mod/fan game in development focusing on breathing new life into the game while polishing pre-existing elements. New story beats, dialogue, and interactions!New areas, NPCs, and environments to explore! New artwork and gameplay to existing environments! A new optional party member! New battles, items, moves, and weapons! New music tracks!
